page.title: 10 Clubs
page.content:
These are some of the clubs that people from the villages of Winterbourne Abbas, Winterbourne Steepleton and Compton Valence attend
Women's Institute- This meets once a month on the first Tuesday in the month either in the village hall at Compton Valence or in the school hall in Winterbourne Abbas.It is a club for ladies. Cub Scouts meet every Wednesday at 6.30 in Martinstown Village hall.It is for boys aged between 8years and 11 years. Brownies meet every Tuesday at 6.30 at Martinstown Village hall.It is for girls aged between 7 and 10 years. The guide meet on Mondays at Martinstown Village Hallat 6.30.It is for girls aged between 10 and 16 years.
